attributes.action: Make compulsory the detailed publication of M.P's expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The signatories to this petition would ask that the expenses of all members of parliament should be open to scrutiny by the people who pay the taxes that allow them such a lavish and undeserved lifestyle. Also that all axpenses should be scrutinised by an independent auditor to weed out any fraudulent or excessive claims.

rejection.details:
This petiton ovelaps with severla already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MPs-expenses/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
